title: My new Main?
body:
Hi community ,
I am searching for my new Main-Champ but he should fit to my way of playing
so I figured out a list of champs the last days that i reduced to 3 of them:
{{champion:81}} Ezreal
{{champion:105}} Fizz
{{champion:78}}  Poppy

Currently I am silver (SURPRISE) so Meta and things .... you know, i dont really care about.

I would like some opinions from you.
 Thank you much for your respondings :)
And sry for bad Angleesh

replies.body: Poppy isnt very common and many players dont really know her well that means they dont know how to play against her too. And with your ult your able to take out carrys like a zed does but you can survive much longer. There are many ways to play her. Jungle, top or supp. You can go more tanky or more dmg based. And she got like 0%ban rate. Look at Fizz ban rate. Poppy can be a very good main but u need timing for her too. Just try her in some normals.

Also zuerst mal bist du im deutschen Forum, also kannst du ruhig auf Deutsch schreiben - deinen anderen Posts nach kannst du das ja. :)
Dann suchst du einen Champ, der zu deinem Spielstil passt. Du erwähnst aber mit keinem Wort, was dein Stil ist...
Darüber hinaus: probier doch einfach alle drei aus und guck welcher dir am besten gefällt; da es nur drei Stück sind sollte das kein all zu großes Problem sein.
